description: A PointCloud is an unordered collection of points that is a sampling of the geometry of a space or space boundary.

properties.name: mimeType
properties.description: Specifies the MIME type of the external point cloud file.

properties.name: pointFile
properties.description: Specifies the URI that points to the external point cloud file.

properties.name: pointFileSrsName
properties.description: Indicates the coordinate reference system used by the external point cloud file.

properties.name: points
properties.description: Relates to the 3D MultiPoint geometry of the PointCloud.
